price: De ki: Rabbimin sözleri için denizler mürekkep olsaydı Rabbin sözleri bitmeden denizler tükenirdi. Hatta bir misli daha mürekkep getirsek bile…
arabic: قُل لَّوۡ كَانَ ٱلۡبَحۡرُ مِدَادٗا لِّكَلِمَٰتِ رَبِّي لَنَفِدَ ٱلۡبَحۡرُ قَبۡلَ أَن تَنفَدَ كَلِمَٰتُ رَبِّي وَلَوۡ جِئۡنَا بِمِثۡلِهِۦ مَدَدٗا

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul law kāna al-baḥru midādan likalimāti rabbī lanafida al-baḥru qabla an tanfada kalimātu rabbī walaw ji'nā bimith'lihi madadan
